TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Panel extends System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl

summary.span: 用于对控件集合进行分组。

span.span: Used to group collections of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是包含其他控件的控件。A is a control that contains other controls. 您可以使用 对控件（如一组控件）的集合进行分组 。You can use a to group collections of controls such as a group of controls. 与其他容器控件（如 控件）一样，如果 控件的 属性设置为，则 `false` 中包含的控件也将被 禁用。As with other container controls such as the control, if the control's property is set to `false`, the controls contained within the will also be disabled. 默认情况下，控件显示时没有任何边框。The control is displayed by default without any borders. 您可以使用属性提供标准或三维边框 ，将面板的区域与窗体上的其他区域区分开来。You can provide a standard or three-dimensional border using the property to distinguish the area of the panel from other areas on the form. 由于 控件派生自 类，因此你可以使用 属性来启用控件中的滚动条 。Because the control derives from the class, you can use the property to enable scroll bars in the control. 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，位于 (中但位于其可见区域外的任何控件) ，都可以滚动到提供的滚动条。When the property is set to `true`, any controls located within the (but outside of its visible region), can be scrolled to with the scroll bars provided. 控件不显示标题。The control does not display a caption. 如果需要与可以显示标题的控件类似的控件 ，请参阅 控件。If you need a control similar to a that can display a caption, see the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，并将 和添加 到 。The following code example creates a control and adds a and a to the . 控件将显示为一个三维边框，以区分 控件相对于窗体上的其他对象的位置。The control is displayed with a three-dimensional border to distinguish where the control is located in relation to other objects on the form. 此示例要求在此示例中定义的方法是从现有窗体中调用的，并且该 命名空间已添加到该窗体的源代码中。This example requires that the method defined in this example is called from within an existing form and that the namespace has been added to the source code for the form. [!code-cpp[Classic Panel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Panel Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Panel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Panel Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Panel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Panel Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoSizeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 属性的值更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Panel1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Panel1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#384](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#384)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#384](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#384)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件显示时没有边框。By default, the control is displayed without a border. 您可以使用此属性将控件的边界 与窗体上的其他区域区分开来。You can use this property to distinguish the boundaries of the control from other areas on the form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 具有三维边框的控件。The following code example creates a control with a three-dimensional border. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点放到该控件上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.

value.span: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点放到此控件上，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 TAB 键时，输入焦点设置为 TAB 键顺序中的下一个控件。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 属性值为的控件 `false` 不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合中。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 可以通过设置控件的属性值来操作 tab 键顺序 。The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's property value. > [!NOTE] > 属性对控件不起任何作用， 因为它是容器对象。The property has no effect on the control as it is a container object.
